Preview.title: Create materials in minutes
Preview.description: Tutory allows you to quickly create PDF materials and online tests with flexible customization right on the platform. Easily edit and adapt them for your lessons!

accordion.title: Creating materials from scratch takes too much time
accordion.description: With Tutory, you can quickly generate learning materials with AI without spending hours on preparation. Simply customize the content, choose the format, and get a ready-to-use PDF document or online test in minutes

accordion.title: Pre-made materials don’t fit specific lessons
accordion.description: Forget about unsuitable templates—Tutory allows you to customize materials to match your lessons. Adjust the content, change the style, and structure everything to perfectly fit your needs.

accordion.title: There’s no easy way to create interactive exercises.
accordion.description: With Tutory, you can effortlessly create online tests using AI. Just add tasks, copy the test link, and send it to your student—no complicated tools or extra steps needed.

items.title: AI Homework Review
items.subTitle: Quickly and accurately check homework with AI, saving time and improving feedback quality.

items.title: Simple Export to PDF
items.subTitle: Easily download completed materials in PDF format for convenient sharing or use during lessons.

items.title: 21 Templates
items.subTitle: Create a variety of materials suitable for both lessons and homework assignments.

items.title: Lesson Tracking
items.subTitle: Conveniently manage scheduled lessons and reschedule them if needed.

items.title: AI Customizable Learning Plan
items.subTitle: Automatically generate and customize learning plans tailored to each student’s goals and progress.

items.title: Student Tests
items.subTitle: Easily share tests with students and review their results in minutes.

items.title: AI Learning Plans
items.description: Tutory allows you to generate personalized learning plans automatically, tailored to the unique goals and needs of each student. The AI analyzes provided data to structure the plan effectively, helping teachers save time and focus on teaching.

items.title: Lesson Assignment Creation
items.description: Create engaging and interactive assignments directly on the platform. Whether for in-class activities or independent practice, the platform offers multiple templates and tools to help teachers quickly design materials that fit their teaching style.

cards.title: Basic
cards.description: Access to the basic Tutory features

cards.title: Premium
cards.description: Unlock the full potential of your teaching journey with Tutory

JoinUs.title: Join Our Closed Tutor Focus Group to Gain Early Access to All Platform Features, Share Your Valuable Feedback and Suggestions, and Help Shape the Future of the Platform to Create an Even Better and More Effective User Experience for Educators and Students!
list: Early access to all platform features
